thread.title: Guess Shares Hit After Kate Upton Accuses Co-Founder of Harassing Women

author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: Guess Shares Hit After Kate Upton Accuses Co-Founder of Harassing Women
text:
Shares of apparel company Guess? Inc. fell 18% Thursday after model and actress Kate Upton accused the company’s co-founder Paul Marciano of using his power in the industry to harass women.
In a tweet posted Wednesday late afternoon, Ms. Upton wrote, “It’s disappointing that such an iconic women’s brand @Guess is still empowering Paul Marciano as their creative director #metoo.”

Soon...
